title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the Warriors winning their 4th NBA championship in 8 years and why he was rooting for their dynasty to continue in a post Kevin Durant era. He explains why Steph Curry didn't need his first NBA Finals MVP in order to validate the greatness of his career thus far. He also defends Jayson Tatum from criticism about his poor performance late in these NBA Finals. Plus, 2-time NBA Champion Kenny Smith joins the show to tell Colin when he knew the Warriors were going to be a special dynasty in the NBA.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
